Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Bulk heterojunction ( BHJ ) photovoltaic device combining P3HT as the electron donor with [6,6]-phenyl C 61 butyric acid methyl ester ( PCBM ) as the electron acceptor have achieved power conversion efficiencies ( PCEs ) as high as 4-5 % .

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| P3HT |
| [6,6]-phenyl C 61 butyric acid methyl ester (PCBM) |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Bulk heterojunction ( BHJ ) photovoltaic device combining P3HT as the electron donor with [6,6]-phenyl C 61 butyric acid methyl ester ( PCBM ) as the electron acceptor have achieved power conversion efficiencies ( PCEs ) as high as 4-5 % .

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value          |
|------------------------|
| Bulk heterojunction (BHJ) |
| P3HT                   |
| [6,6]-phenyl C61 butyric acid methyl ester (PCBM) |
| power conversion efficiencies (PCEs) |
| 4-5 %                  |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value          |
|------------------------|
| power conversion efficiencies (PCEs) |
| 4-5 %                  |
| P3HT                   |
| [6,6]-phenyl C61 butyric acid methyl ester (PCBM) |

Explanation:

* Bulk heterojunction (BHJ) is a type of photovoltaic device, not a material property value.
* The paragraph mentions "have achieved power conversion efficiencies (PCEs) as high as 4-5 %", so PCEs and 4-5 % are the property values.
* P3HT and PCBM are materials used in the photovoltaic device, but they are the donor and acceptor materials respectively, not property values. However, since the paragraph mentions their specific values (P3HT and PCBM) in relation to the property value (PCEs), they are included in the table for completeness.
